response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and strategic acumen. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns for you. I look forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting venture.", "product_price": 12000}
